Reviews.Title: Send back to China!
Reviews.Author: T-Bow
Reviews.Content: I bought this looking at description but nothing described was accurate. Save your time and don't bother. Batteries would go dead in week and not even used. View of  camera only on 2 seconds, very annoying.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy and safe operation: After you press the touch button, you can see a big image on the display for safety. Super power saving: press monitor button by 1500pcs at least per 3pcs AA batteries (Batteries are not included in the kit)
High resolution images: 320*240 3.5" clear LCD screen, focused and vivid images, better than traditional door viewers. Multiple chord melodies: 16 chord melodies for option, melody volume is adjustable.
Better visibility of big images: The digital door viewer can neatly and clearly shows images, unlike traditional door viewers which distort images. Super large field of view: 150 degree wide angle facing outside the front door.
"Do not disturb(DND)" Function: When at "DND" state , anyone press call button ,indoor display have no door chime sound.
Package include: 1 x Peephole viewer, 1 x Base Flange, 1 x Peephole len, 1 x 11cm wire, 1 x Peephole Barrel(Note: 3 pieces of AA batteries are NOT included.)
ProductInfo.Name: Digital 3.5 inch TFT LCD Door Viewer Doorbell Visual Video Security Camera (300,000 Pixel CMOS)
